ph.text1: It’s the pH of water. This numerical value will be between 0 and 14. Water has a neutral pH of 7, which indicates that it is neither acidic or basic.
ph.text2: This value is not required for the potability calculations!

Hardness.text1: It’s the capacity of water to precipitate soap in mg/L. This numerical value will most probably be between 47.4 and 323.
Hardness.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Solids.text1: It’s the total dissolved solids in ppm. This numerical value will most probably be between 321 and 61.2k.
Solids.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Chloramines.text1: It’s the amount of chloramines in ppm. This numerical value will most probably be between 0.35 and 13.1.
Chloramines.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Sulfate.text1: It’s the amount of Sulfates dissolved in mg/L. This numerical value will most probably be between 0.35 and 13.1.
Sulfate.text2: This value is not required for the potability calculations!

Conductivity.text1: It’s the Electrical conductivity of water in μS/cm. This numerical value will most probably be between 181 and 753.
Conductivity.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Organic_carbon.text1: It’s the amount of organic carbon in ppm. This numerical value will most probably be between 2.2 and 28.3.
Organic_carbon.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Trihalomethanes.text1: It’s the amount of Trihalomethanes in μg/L. This numerical value will most likely be between 0.74 and 124.
Trihalomethanes.text2: This value is not required for the potability calculations!

Turbidity.text1: It’s the measure of light emitting property of water in NTU. This numerical value will most probably be between 1.45 and 6.74.
Turbidity.text2: The * icon indicates that you must enter a value, the box can not be left blank!

Potable.text1: The water is safe to drink!

Not Potable.text1: The water is unsafe to drink!
